01. Headers
.c-header-xxl The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
.c-header-xl The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
.c-header-lg The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
.c-header-md The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
.c-header-sm The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
.c-header-xs The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

Functions and mixins demos


@include font-header();

@include font-header(xxl);

@include font-header(xl);

@include font-header(lg);

@include font-header(md);

@include font-header(sm);

@include font-header(xs);

@include font-body();

@include font-body(xxl);

@include font-body(xl);

@include font-body(lg);

@include font-body(md);

@include font-body(sm);

@include font-body(xs);

@include font-body(xl, $size-only: true);
Function example with line-height, font-weight, and font-size
Output header font family and weight settings only
Output body font family and weight settings only
